website_summaries.verdict: The Sony NWZ-S610 series Walkman doesn't bring anything striking or new to the table, but that doesn't change the fact that it's a quality MP3 player with nice extras and a killer battery life. Plus, Sony got rid of SonicStage--the best news ever.
pros: The Sony NWZ-S610 series features a compact design with a high-quality feel and an ample screen
The user interface is intuitive, and there are plenty of features to choose from, such as an FM radio and photo and video playback
No more awful SonicStage software: this Walkman is a PlaysForSure device supporting subscription tracks as well as unprotected WMA, MP3, and even AAC files
The player offers good sound quality and an excellent rated battery life
cons: The Sony NWZ-S610 series doesn't offer any exceptional new technology, and there are cheaper competitors that offer the same features

customer_reviews.title: Not enough memory
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product and it said it would store over 1,000 songs. I barely got 500 in there and it said it was full. Also, was not user friendly. I have a Sony Walkman that is much older that I have about 750 songs on, wanted to upgrade. A total waste of money and I should have known better, it was not Prime.
customer_reviews.author: Woodyspond

customer_reviews.title: Rich sound in such a tiny package
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this MP3 player recently and it's wonderful. I was not that computer savvy in converting the music format to smaller kps so that the tracks could fit on the player, but once I figured it out, it was easy, hence I wish the instructions were of more help to those of us who need a little "music download 101" (smile). I am new to the MP3 music format, but it's wonderful considering they replace the hundreds of CD's that I have..I am a die-hard Sony(and Amazon) fan for years, and this is one more star in my collection..You rock Sony..Thanks....BJ
customer_reviews.author: B. Jenga

customer_reviews.title: Nice little MP3 player.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this MP3 Player. It also came in excellent condition in a very timely manner. I've been using it for music only at this time. I've had it for only about 10 days so far. It does have space for pictures and also has a radio. I haven't checked out the radio. I wanted Sony because I believe it has better music quality than other MP3's I've used and the price was about the same.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny D.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I have only had for a few months but it is good for the price! It comes with a Windows Media Player upgrade cd, but I was able to just drag my music in without using that. It has good sound and easy to use, i like the hold button so that I don't waste the battery getting tossed around in my bag. my only two complaints are that you cannot make a playlist on the device, you have to make it on the computer and that I have only had it a few months and have had to use the reset button already.
customer_reviews.author: andreahope

customer_reviews.title: Great little mp3 player, too bad Amazon didn't honor price match
customer_reviews.text: This is a great mp3 player for the money, easy to use long battery life, and very easy to transfer audio and video files to. Unfortunately A couple of days after I bought it, I noticed that its price at Amazon had decreased. After several attempts to get Amazon to do a price match I gave up. They said they have a new policy and will no longer price match. I felt kind of cheated. The player is great though!
customer_reviews.author: T. Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome !!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this MP3 ! I bought one for my daughter for christmas since she loves to listen to her music. It was extremely easier to use, and even a child under 10 can figure it out. Adding & deleting songs are a snap. I liked it so much, I bought a second one for myself. Highly recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I'm very happy with Sony
customer_reviews.text: The Sony 2 GB Walkman video MP3 player is a good product, I like their small size and operation is easy, no have problem whith de controls, and this have a system similar to ipod. I recomended this product, for me sony is sony, they always bring excelent products. The unique problem is the video conversion, you need buy a software to do it.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Castro Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Sony 2GB walkman/video player scores a hit!
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described, and worked perfectly out of the box. The video is crisp, the sound is fantastic, I guess the radio reception depends on where you live, but it certainly is a bonus. They packed a lot of features into that "itty, bitty can" I would heartily recommend this as a perfect replacement for that "other" sound system.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Kanzer

customer_reviews.title: love my MP3 player
customer_reviews.text: I love my MP3 player. far better than Ipod. The only problem I have is the battery doesn't last as long as it says. I generally get about 20 hours on a battery charge. You will never get any MP3 player with better sound quality and setting for sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: The player exceeded my expectations and I was happy to give it to my friend as a replacement for the one she lost. It was in great condition and it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Nilah DeLetto

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product!
customer_reviews.text: This mp3 player is great. Very small and easy to take everywhere. It even hooks up tp the stereo in my car. Easy to use and the battery lasts a long time. Great value for the money. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: B. Breuklander

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for my sister.
customer_reviews.text: This little Walkman is a fantastic traveling companion, good sound, screen resolution is sharp and bright, my sister takes this thing everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: H.E. Jovel

customer_reviews.title: Amazing MP3 player
customer_reviews.text: Another MP3 player that easily beats iPod. Easy to use, great sound, nice display and FM radio.
customer_reviews.author: DanSol

customer_reviews.title: MP3
customer_reviews.text: I've had this item for years, and have still not really learned how to use it. It's a cute little MP3, but not very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Bever

customer_reviews.title: 7 years and still my favorite MP3 player
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my first mp3 player in 2007. I immediately loaded all my music on it and also my two favorite movies:.Forest Gump and Blow. After about 2 years I. Decided to upgrade to an iPod. After a few months I returned. I always came back to the Sony. My 12 year old borrowed it a few months ago and wasn't going to give it back. I love this player and even though there are ones with bigger screens, touch screens, hd, etc....I wouldn't trade this one for any other brand, model, feature, etc (at least for more than a few minutes)...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Sony Walkman MP3 player a little over a month ago to replace my old iPod shuffle. Transferring my iTunes files to it took all of maybe 30 seconds and was easy as could be. Then I ripped some cd's and transferred them again easy as could be. Love the pink color and the size. I use it at the gym and it makes working out a lot easier. 2 minor complaints. The headphones hurt my ears so I'll probably need to replace them. Wish it came with a clip or armband. Sound is great. Haven't used for videos yet. Overall, I love it and have no regrets about this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S

customer_reviews.title: Great product at an even better price!
customer_reviews.text: I have an ipod nano, but bought the black 2GB Sony for my husband for Christmas. I liked his so much, I bought the pink one for myself! It is way easier to load than the ipod - just drag n' drop - and plays many formats without having to convert song files (which you DO have to do with the ipod using the ipod software ~ and it took forever to do that on my pc). I am VERY pleased with this 2GB Sony, and at almost half the price of my nano, it is a great buy. I haven't used the nano since.
customer_reviews.author: Carly Maxey

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as ipod if not better
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 10 year old as a christmas gift and she loves it.I cant imagen an ipod sounding any better and this was cheaper.Its very easy to use click and drop and your ready to listen to some music for hours and I mean hours this battery goes forever 33 hours much longer than most mp3 players(15 hrs. average from research I did)It plays videos you can download pictures has FM radio.ipod has nothing on this player.Now I want one.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy R. Richards

customer_reviews.title: Cute MP3 Player
customer_reviews.text: It's so cute and dainty that my kids wanted it for themselves! I love how it's able to play videos. I have no problem with it. I just have to make sure I switch the Hold button so as not to drain the battery.
customer_reviews.author: tjmerced

product_meta.title: Sony 2 GB Walkman Video MP3 Player (Pink)
product_meta.description:
Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe NWZ-S615F Walkman Video MP3 player combines a powerful digital music player with a 1.8" QVGA LCD screen9 for hours of multimedia entertainment. Available in black, pink, or red, the 2GB1 player weighs less than 2 ounces yet provides the capacity to store up to 1,150 songs A built-in FM tuner lets you listen to your favorite radio stations, or use the LCD screen to play back hours of high-quality video or view JPEG photo images5. Slim and stylish, the NWZ-S615F MP3 Player is the perfect MP3 player for your mobile multimedia lifestyle.

AMAZON.COM
Slim and stylish, the NWZ-S615FPNK Walkman Video MP3 player combines a powerful digital music player with a 1.8" QVGA LCD screen for hours of multimedia entertainment. Listen to your favorite songs, view videos and photographs or listen to your favorite radio stations. Weighing less than 2 ounces but with the capacity to store up to 1,150 songs, hours of video or hundreds of photographs, the 2GB NWZ-S615FPNK Walkman Video MP3 player delivers everything you need to take your favorite entertainment with you. Also available in black, red and silver.

2GB Built-in Memory
Store up to 1,150 songs or up to 7H 10M of video on your Walkman Video MP3 player and never be without your entertainment again. 

High Quality Video Playback
Playback your favorite videos right on the player using the MPEG 4 profile at 30 frames per second. 

Battery Life
With up to 33 hours of audio playback and up to 8 hours of video playback you don't have to worry about charging your player. 

1.8" QVGA LCD Screen
Easily view your movies, photos and music information on the high quality, 320x240 display. 

Compatible with Secure Windows Media Audio
Giving you more options than ever for downloading and listening to music. 

MP3/WMA/AAC Audio Codec Support
Supports playback of MP3 and WMA DRM and non-DRM audio files downloaded from multiple sources. Will also support AAC non-DRM content, giving you multiple options for downloading music the way you want. 

3 Clear Audio Technologies
Utilizes 3 Clear Audio Technologies to reproduce crystal clear, CD-quality audio. 

 * Digital Sound Enhancement Engine (DSEE) restores the higher sound frequency lost when creating compressed music files. 
 * Clear Bass enhances the bass sound while minimizing distortion. 
 * Clear Stereo reduces signal leakage from one channel to another. 

FM Tuner with 30 Station Presets
Allows you to preset and listen to your favorite radio stations while on the go. 

Time Machine Shuffle
Shuffle play among songs from a randomly selected year. (Information will come from CD information that is downloaded from the Gracenote CDDB) 

Music Search
Search for music on your Walkman video player by All Songs, Album, Artist, Genre, Release Year, Folder and Playlists. 

Initial Search
Use the first letter of the song, album or artist to easily find the music you are looking for. 

Bi-Directional LCD Display
Watch your videos and view your photographs either vertically or horizontally by adjusting the screen to the orientation you prefer. 

What's in the Box
NWZ-S615FPNK Walkman Video MP3 player, USB Cable (22 pin to USB), MDR-E804LP Headphones and extension cord, CD-ROM with Windows Media Player 11 and MP3 Conversion Tools, Quick Start Guide.
feature_bullets: High quality video playback at 30 frames per second
Up to 33 Hours of Battery Life
Compatible with Secure Windows Media Audio

specifications.Customer Reviews: 2.6 out of 5 stars23 ratings2.6 out of 5 stars
